text: On the issue of whether David is fast, the fact that David set a high school track record.
On the issue of whether Rebecca was ill, the fact that Rebecca told Ronald that she was unwell.
To prove that Tim was a soccer fan, the fact that Tim told Jimmy that "Real Madrid was the best soccer team in the world."
When asked by the attorney on cross-examination, Alice testified that she had "never seen the plaintiff before, and had no idea who she was."
On the issue of whether Martin punched James, the fact that Martin smiled and nodded when asked if he did so by an officer on the scene.
